name: Space Ship Future Combat
description:
In this game you are a FPS Sniper on galaxy with a secret mission, in order to complete your first mission you will have to clear a secret neon robot base. Be careful in that secret neon buildings there are combat robots of enemies on duty to hack galaxy . Your important mission is to kill them all and keep silent movement moving in your special mission. There are multi levels, every game level has different story line than previous .Fight as a sniper assassin gun shooter!
Features:
- Futuristic but gorgious Robot girl battlefields
- Classic but destructive weapons
- Classic but smooth control
- Modern galaxy environment game play
- Alien battle,don't forget your weapon
- Addictive game story with multi levels.
